content: अवमर्दः {@--1@} Trampling upon. {@--2@} Pain, toils; रणावमर्दमासाद्य <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} An expedient of a Government, inflicting punishment on an enemy by laying his country waste, devastation, oppression; अवमर्दः प्रतीघातस्तथा चैव बलीयसां <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} Slaying, killing; <ls>U. 5. 8.</ls>
